articles.title: A winning Powerball ticket remains unclaimed in Mass. — and expires next month
articles.description:
If you bought a Powerball ticket in Marlborough last year, you may want to read this.

The post A winning Powerball ticket remains unclaimed in Mass. — and expires next month appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: A winning Powerball ticket worth $1 million remains unclaimed in Marlborough.
The ticket was purchased last year and expires on December 4, 2023.
Boston residents are encouraged to check their tickets to avoid losing the prize.

articles.title: W. Va. couple had their dream Halloween wedding in Salem
articles.description:
Their love story is truly bewitching.

The post W. Va. couple had their dream Halloween wedding in Salem appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: West Virginia couple celebrated Halloween wedding in Salem on October 31, 2025.
Event attracted local vendors and tourists, boosting Salem's Halloween tourism.
Wedding highlights Salem's reputation as a popular Halloween destination for couples.
